_comment_schema_version: Version of this policy schema. Increment only if structure changes.
_comment_generated_at_utc: Timestamp when this config was generated. Used for debugging and cache validation.

global._comment_grace_offline_hours: If app cannot fetch config, cached config is trusted for these many hours.
global._comment_default_action_if_unreachable: Behavior if config cannot be fetched and cache expired. Options: ALLOW, ALLOW_WITH_WARNING, FORCE_UPDATE

ios._comment_latest_app_version: Newest app version available on App Store.
ios._comment_min_supported_app_version: Lowest app version allowed to run. Anything below this is blocked.
ios._comment_min_supported_os_version: Minimum iOS version required to support the app. Below this is End-of-Life (EOL).

policy._comment_when_below_min_app: Action when app version < min_supported_app_version. FORCE_UPDATE = hard block.
policy._comment_when_below_min_os: Action when OS version < min_supported_os_version. EOL_BLOCK = stop app usage.
policy._comment_when_below_latest: Action when app version < latest_app_version but >= min_supported_app_version.

store._comment_url: Direct App Store deep link used for update redirection.

soft_update.title: Update available
soft_update._comment_title: Title text for soft update prompt.
soft_update.message: Version 5.0.4 includes important improvements and fixes. Please update for the best experience.
soft_update._comment_message: Message shown when update is recommended but not mandatory.
soft_update._comment_secondary_cta: Secondary button label allowing user to skip.

force_update.title: Update required
force_update._comment_title: Title text for force update screen.
force_update.message: This version is no longer supported. Please update to continue using the app.
force_update._comment_message: Message shown when update is mandatory.
force_update._comment_primary_cta: Only button allowed on force update screen.

eol.title: Device no longer supported
eol.message: Your device cannot run the latest version of this app. Support for this version has ended.
eol._comment_message: Message shown when OS/device is no longer supported.
eol._comment_primary_cta: Primary action when device is unsupported.

android._comment_latest_app_version: Newest app version available on Play Store.
android._comment_min_supported_app_version: Lowest app version allowed to run.
android._comment_min_supported_os_version: Minimum Android OS version supported (major version or API level).

policy._comment_when_below_min_os: Block app due to unsupported OS.

store._comment_url: Play Store deep link for update.
